project.name: C-C609A-SUBV-04-ST02-DT01-DF14-CF02-01
project.description: Creating test case using base program. Added an environment variable read to get a filename to read in the file contents using an fread operation within the function Completed injection.

iopair.name: C-C609A-SUBV-04-ST02-DT01-DF14-CF02-01-GOOD-01
iopair.description: create a repository This weakness expects a string in the form: '<qsize> <file1> <file2> <data>' where qsize is the size of the quick sort (used to delay execution in certain benign cases), file1 and file2 are files to be read (also to delay execution), and data is a string containing no spaces. It does a double checked lock which can allow a second thread to return an uninitialized struct while the first thread is in the process of initialization, leading to a null pointer dereference.

process.script: if [[ -f "/opt/stonesoup/workspace/inputDaemons/preprocess_daemon_script_01.pid" ]]; then killtree.sh -s 9 -p $(cat "/opt/stonesoup/workspace/inputDaemons/preprocess_daemon_script_01.pid") && echo "Killed script."; else echo "Failed: Script PID file does not exist."; fi

scoring_formula.formula: STDOUT AND NOT TIMEOUT AND NOT CONTROLLED_EXIT

iopair.name: C-C609A-SUBV-04-ST02-DT01-DF14-CF02-01-GOOD-02
iopair.description: commit a file This weakness expects a string in the form: '<qsize> <file1> <file2> <data>' where qsize is the size of the quick sort (used to delay execution in certain benign cases), file1 and file2 are files to be read (also to delay execution), and data is a string containing no spaces. It does a double checked lock which can allow a second thread to return an uninitialized struct while the first thread is in the process of initialization, leading to a null pointer dereference.

process.script: cd ../good-02 && cp file.txt stonesoup && cd stonesoup && $SS_TC_DEPS/bin/svn add file.txt

if [[ -f "/opt/stonesoup/workspace/inputDaemons/preprocess_daemon_script_01.pid" ]]; then killtree.sh -s 9 -p $(cat "/opt/stonesoup/workspace/inputDaemons/preprocess_daemon_script_01.pid") && echo "Killed script."; else echo "Failed: Script PID file does not exist."; fi

scoring_formula.formula: CHECKOUT AND ADD AND COMMIT AND NOT TIMEOUT AND NOT CONTROLLED_EXIT
